welcome_message_body: Welcome to Polomolok, where the lush greenery and warm hospitality await you. Known for its scenic landscapes and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and savor all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.address: French St (Pan-Philippine Highway), 9504 Polomolok, South Cotabato
